connect20/cybage_megamenu.name: connect20/Cybage_Megamenu

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/cybage_megamenu.description: Administrator can use the Megamenu plug-in for Navigation Menu Management at Magento store. For example, you can list category, product,contact us and link in main menu  .
